vision.title: Our Vision for Christian Devotionals
vision.description: Christian Devotionals is your mobile companion designed to enrich and strengthen your spiritual life. Our goal is to be your daily bridge to God's word, offering inspiring and relevant biblical content. We believe in technology serving your faith, providing a fluid, fast, and reliable experience completely free of charge.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy for the "Christian Devotionals" Application
privacy.description: This Privacy Policy describes how the "Christian Devotionals" mobile application (hereinafter, "the Application"), owned and operated by **Develop4God**, handles user information. The privacy of our users is of utmost importance to us.
privacy.section1_title: 1. Information We Collect and How We Use It
privacy.section1_text: The "Christian Devotionals" Application collects and processes certain types of data to offer its functionalities and improve the user experience. We want to be transparent about what data is collected and for what purpose:
privacy.section1_list1_text: We collect device identifiers (such as Firebase Cloud Messaging - FCM tokens) and, when available and permitted by the user, the Android advertising ID.
privacy.section1_list1_purpose_text: Used to send push notifications (FCM), for application usage analysis (Firebase Analytics), and for advertising campaign attribution.
privacy.section1_list2_text: We collect the date and time of the last login (`lastLogin`).
privacy.section1_list2_purpose_text: For user account administration (via Firebase Authentication) and for basic activity statistics.
privacy.section1_list3_text: We collect data about user interactions with the application (e.g., button clicks, screen visits) and devotionals saved as favorites.
privacy.section1_list3_purpose_text: For usage statistics (Firebase Analytics), to improve application features, and to personalize the user experience (e.g., showing favorite devotionals).
privacy.section1_list4_text: We collect crash and diagnostics data.
privacy.section1_list4_purpose_text: To monitor the stability and performance of the application, detect and fix errors, and ensure a fluid experience.
privacy.section1_list5_text: We collect interaction logs to understand how users navigate and use the application interface.
privacy.section1_list5_purpose_text: For usage statistics and analysis (Firebase Analytics).
privacy.section1_list6_text: We store user preferences related to notifications (e.g., if notifications are enabled, preferred notification time, user's time zone).
privacy.section1_list6_purpose_text: To allow notification features to operate according to user preferences and to send timely developer communications.
privacy.important_note_text: The Application does not directly collect your name, email address, phone number, precise location, or other personally identifiable information (PII) other than what is mentioned above, unless you explicitly provide it through third-party functionalities (such as PayPal) or external authentication services.
privacy.section2_title: 2. How the Application Works and Local Data Handling
privacy.section2_text: Some Application functionalities operate primarily locally on your device:
privacy.section2_list1_text: The devotional content is loaded for viewing. Reading activity is not recorded on a personal level.
privacy.section2_list2_text: The "save favorites" functionality is performed locally on your device and is synchronized with your user account in Firebase Firestore for persistence and access from other devices (if you log in with the same account). This data is accessible and managed by us to provide you with this functionality.
privacy.section2_list3_text: When you share a devotional, we do not store the information of the recipient or the content of the message you send. This process is handled by your device's native sharing functions.
privacy.section3_text: We are committed to protecting the security of your data. We use administrative, technical, and physical measures to protect against unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, or destruction of the information we collect and store. However, no security measure is 100% perfect. We recommend you use strong passwords and protect your account information.
privacy.section4_text: The Application uses third-party services that may collect information. These services have their own privacy policies:
privacy.section4_list1: **Firebase (Google):** For authentication, databases (Firestore), notifications (FCM), and analytics. Firebase's privacy policy is available at [https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy](https://firebase.google.com/support/privacy).
privacy.section4_list2: **PayPal:** For donations. PayPal's privacy policy is available at [https://www.paypal.com/myaccount/privacy/privacyhub](https://www.paypal.com/myaccount/privacy/privacyhub).
privacy.section4_list3: Other services: The Application may also use other third-party services for specific functions, such as sending emails. These services will only have access to the information necessary to provide their service.
privacy.section5_text: The Application is not intended for use by children under 13 years of age. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If we become aware that we have collected information from a child under 13 without verifiable parental consent, we will take steps to remove that information from our servers.
privacy.section6_text: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last Updated" date at the top. We recommend you review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes.
privacy.section7_text: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or wish to request the deletion of your data, please do not hesitate to contact us at: develop4God@gmail.com.
